name.value: Gastroenterology: Hepatitis C - Elbasvir/Grazoprevir Order Set

title.value: Gastroenterology: Hepatitis C - Elbasvir/Grazoprevir Order Set

display.value: Adult patients with chronic Hepatitis C infection

description.value: Elbasvir/grazoprevir is contraindicated in patients with decompensated cirrhosis. Elbasvir/grazoprevir should not be used in combination with 1) strong CYP3A inducers; or 2) OATP1B1/3 inhibitors; or 3) efavirenz. Providers should check http://www.hep-druginteractions.org, https://www.hepatitis.va.gov/provider/guidelines/hcv-treatment-considerations.asp, and/or a pharmacist for additional drug interactions or contraindications before starting elbasvir/grazoprevir.

title.value: Qualifications for the following treatment include: Genotype 1a, Treatment-Naïve or Treatment-Experienced (PEG/RBV), No NS5A Polymorphisms at Position 28, 30, 31, or 93, without Cirrhosis or with Compensated Cirrhosis (CTP A).

title.value: Laboratory Tests
Guidance for providers who are referring a patient to gastroenterology for management of hepatitis C
26604007 |Complete blood count (procedure)|

description.value: Complete blood count 1 time (routine)

title.value: 26958001 |Hepatic function panel (procedure)|

description.value: Hepatic function panel 1 time (routine)

title.value: 440685005 |Calculation of international normalized ratio (procedure)|

description.value: International normalized ratio 1 time (routine)

title.value: 1421000205106 |Basic metabolic panel (procedure)

description.value: Basic metabolic panel 1 time (routine)

title.value: 167181009 |Measurement of renal clearance of creatinine (procedure)|

description.value: Glomerular Filtration rate 1 time (routine)

title.value: Recommended if it has not been done for the past 5 years
397662006 |Hepatitis C virus genotype determination (procedure)|

description.value: HCV genotype 1 time (routine)

title.value: These tests are recommended if they have not been done for the past 10 years
47758006 |Hepatitis B surface antigen measurement (procedure)|

description.value: Hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) 1 time (routine)

expression.value: NOT EXISTS 'Hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) 1 time'

title.value: 59582004 |Hepatitis B core antibody measurement (procedure)|

description.value: Hepatitis B core antibody (HBcAb) 1 time (routine)

expression.value: NOT EXISTS 'Hepatitis B core antibody (HBcAb) 1 time'

title.value: 65911000 |Hepatitis B surface antibody measurement (procedure)|

description.value: Hepatitis B surface antibody (HBsAb) 1 time (routine)

expression.value: NOT EXISTS 'Hepatitis B surface antibody (HBsAb) 1 time'

title.value: 697001 |Hepatitis A virus antibody measurement (procedure)|

description.value: Hepatitis A antibody (HAVAb) 1 time (routine)

title.value: The following lab is recommended if not performed within the previous 6 months.
395197008 |Hepatitis C viral load (procedure)|

description.value: HCV viral load (quantitative HCV RNA) 1 time (routine)

expression.value: NOT EXISTS 'HCV viral load (quantitative HCV RNA) 1 time'

display.value: HCV viral load (quantitative HCV RNA) 1 time (routine)

title.value: The following lab is recommended if not performed within the previous 5 years.
359796005 |Measurement of both Human immunodeficiency virus 1 antibody and Human immunodeficiency virus 2 antibody (procedure)|

description.value: HIV test 1 time (routine)

title.value: 8671fdfe-53a5-4cae-91a3-61fd23f5bbd4 |Analysis of resistance-associated substitutions in Hepatitis C virus genes (procedure)

description.value: Resistance-associated substitutions 1 time (routine)

title.value: The following lab is recommended if not performed within the previous 2 weeks.
386558001 |Chorionic gonadotropin, beta-subunit measurement (procedure)|

description.value: Qualitative human chorionic gonadotropin 1 time (routine)

expression.value: NOT EXISTS 'Qualitative human chorionic gonadotropin 1 time'

title.value: Patient and Caregiver Education
This section should be available to users in gastroenterology settings and for primary care providers who are referring a patient to gastroenterology for management of hepatitis C
